tool_description: An anime recommending API. It takes in an anime and the amount of recommendations gives back the number of recommendations based on the anime. Uses ML to make recommendations.
name: Anime Recommender
title: Anime Recommender

api_list.name: GET Auto Complete
api_list.description: Auto Complete, as name implies, auto complete of a search, returns up to the desired amount.

api_list.name: GET Anime_Title_Exists
api_list.description: Returns Boolean to represent if anime title exists

api_list.name: GET Anime Info
api_list.description:
Get info on a specific anime

returns general ready-to-use info on an anime.

api_list.name: GET Anime Titles
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-recommender.p.rapidapi.com/get_titles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-recommender.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-recommender.p.rapidapi.com/get_titles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-recommender.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
